comment._content: Google Streetview from Bridge Street looking east: [View Larger Map] and from Beecroft Road looking south : [View Larger Map] The old mansion (at left) on the corner of Langton Street and Epping Road can still be seen in this 1953 Epping aerial photo - it was demolished, I think in the 1960s: [open to original size]: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46/9142070516/in/photostream/] I wonder what happened to the memorial column!

comment._content: There is something odd about that photo because it doesn't look correct for either Beecroft Road nor Bridge Street
